Type Alias# TimeSeriesClassifier.Configuration

iOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+Mac Catalyst 18.0+macOS 15.0+tvOS 18.0+visionOS 2.0+

```
typealias Configuration = TimeSeriesClassifierConfiguration
```

Available when `Scalar` conforms to `MLShapedArrayScalar`, `Scalar` conforms to `BinaryFloatingPoint`, `Label` conforms to `Comparable`, `Label` conforms to `Decodable`, `Label` conforms to `Encodable`, and `Label` conforms to `Hashable`.## [See Also](/documentation/CreateMLComponents/TimeSeriesClassifier/Configuration-swift.typealias#see-also)

### [Supporting types](/documentation/CreateMLComponents/TimeSeriesClassifier/Configuration-swift.typealias#Supporting-types)

[`struct Model`](/documentation/createmlcomponents/timeseriesclassifier/model)A time-series classifier model.
